Stellenbeschreibung Betriebsarzt &nbsp; Vollständige Stellenbeschreibung 102450 Full time 39 hrs./week Munich We are Helmholtz Munich. In a rapidly ch
anging world, we discover breakthrough solutions for better health. Our research is focused within the areas of metabolic health/diabetes, environment
al health, molecular targets and therapies, cell programming and repair, bioengineering, and computational health. We particularly excel in the fields
 of basic research, bioengineering, artificial intelligence, and technological development. Through this research, we build the foundations for medica
l innovation. Together with our partners, we seek to accelerate the transfer of our research, so that laboratory ideas can reach society and improve p
eople’s quality of life at the fastest rate possible. This is what drives us. Why not join us and make a difference? The Research Unit focusing on Cen
tral Nervous System Regeneration (CNR) conducts in-depth inquiries into the intricate interplay of glial cells in brain regeneration and the pathogene
sis of glial scar formation subsequent to brain trauma. Our primary objective revolves around the advancement of tailored therapeutic interventions ai
med at restoring and optimizing brain functionality. Prof. Matthias Tschöp (Dr. Med., Dr. hc.), CEO of Helmholtz Munich: "We believe that excellent re
search requires a range of different perspectives. Diverse teams reach better solutions and are more innovative in their research topics. Establishing
 our Diversity Management Strategy demonstrates our commitment to ensuring an appreciative company culture based on mutual respect. We are also implem
enting diversity-sensitive processes throughout our whole organization." Your tasks Participate in research activities focusing on the function of gli
al cells following brain injury Conduct experimental research using advanced techniques such as single cell and spatial transcriptomics, intracranial 
injections, and development of new assays for brain injuries in human models (brain organoids) Analyze and integrate genetic and physiological data fr
om animal models, human models and human samples Collaborate with an interdisciplinary team to integrate findings and contribute to high-impact public
ations Present research findings at national and international scientific meetings Your profile Exceptional students holding a Master’s degree in a re
levant field and a strong interest in glial biology Demonstrable experience in molecular biology techniques, animal models, or glial biology Outstandi
ng motivation to participate in a competitive research program Excellent English language proficiency, both written and spoken Benefits Scientific Tra
ining: Helmholtz Munich Graduate School Career counseling: Career Center for PhD candidates Recreation: 30 days annual leave, flexi days, plus public 
holidays Health Promotion: Sports, company doctor, mental health initiatives International Staff Service: Support with the relocation and integration 
process in Germany Since 2005, we hold the TOTAL E-QUALITY award for exemplary action in the sense of an equal-opportunity organizational culture. Hel
mholtz Munich is actively committed to diversity and inclusion in practice and is sustainably committed to equality. The Diversity Charter has set its
elf the goal of promoting diversity in the world of work. By signing the charter, we commit ourselves to create an appreciative working environment fo
r all employees. This position provides the opportunity for you to build specialist knowledge whilst developing key professional experience, both of w
hich will help you to make strides in your scientific career. Remuneration and social security benefits are based on the German Collective Wage Agreem
ent for Public-Sector Employees at Federal Level (EG 13 50% TV EntgO Bund). In addition, there is also the possibility of receiving an allowance if th
e applicable conditions are met. The position has an (initial) fixed term of three years but may be extended under certain circumstances. We are commi
tted to promoting a culture of diversity and welcome applications from talented people regardless of gender, cultural background, nationality, ethnici
ty, sexual identity, physical abilities, religion or age. Qualified applicants with physical disabilities will be given preference. If you have obtain
ed a university degree abroad, we will require further documents from you regarding the comparability of your degree. Interested in applying? If you h
ave any questions, feel free to contact Prof. Dr. Jovica Ninkovic, jovica.ninkovic@helmholtz-munich.de, who will be happy to help. Your application sh
ould include CV Cover letter Degrees/Diplomas/Certificates Contact details for at least two referees We are Helmholtz Munich. How we promote your care
er? Helmholtz Munich Deutsches Forschungszentrum für Gesundheit und Umwelt (GmbH) Research Unit Central Nervous System Regeneration Grosshaderner Stra

n &nbsp; Vollständige Stellenbeschreibung Saarbrücken, Deutschland The Secure Cyber-Physical Systems (SCy-Phy) Group of Nils Ole Tippenhauer is lookin
g for PhD Candidates with interest in security of embedded and cyber-physical systems. Possible topics for a thesis could be: Anomaly and intrusion de
tection for embedded and cyber-physical systems (using process data, traffic and hardware features). Solutions can be AI-based, or using mathematical 
process models. Security analysis of proprietary (wired and wireless) protocols, firmware and applications. Attacks and countermeasures for realworld 
cyber-physical systems such as autonomous vehicles, drones and other critical infrastructure. More detailed information about the SCy-Phy group can be
 found on: https://scy-phy.net/ And if you want to know more about Nils you can visit: https://tippenhauer.de/ What we offer Full time-gross base sala
ry for E13 according to the scale of the TVöD (German Federal Employment Agreement) Comprehensive benefits package that includes health insurance cove
rage, 30 days of paid vacation and a robust pension scheme. Possibilities for personal and professional growth, encompassing language classes, researc
h support, as well as extracurricular and social activities Our onboarding team will provide you with all the necessary support for a seamless and suc
cessful start to your journey with us What we expect You have a Master’s degree from a research-oriented institution of higher education in Computer S
cience, Computer Engineering or a related field. We maintain a trustworthy, inclusive, and safe space and are looking for new colleagues willing to co
ntribute to an enjoyable and friendly team atmosphere. Excellent English, but no German! CISPA is a fully international research institute. Knowing Ge
rman is really not necessary, although daily life is a bit smoother if you speak a few words and if you want to learn German, we offer free courses. W
ork @ CISPA We promote a flat hierarchy that encourages working together as a cohesive team and contributing one’s perspectives and ideas. We offer an
 exceptional research infrastructure and a robust science support system. Our location St. Ingbert is near Saarbrücken which is a city with internatio
nal flair (e.g., an International School and distinguished cuisine influenced by the proximity to the French border). The city is also known for its g
reen spaces, parks and proximity to nature, providing opportunities for relaxation and outdoor activities. Application Process Qualified candidates wh
o wish to pursue a doctoral degree in a research area covered by CISPA faculty may apply at any time. We will accept applications throughout the year 
for exceptionally strong candidates. Admitted applicants will have an opportunity to visit the center and its partner institutions and interact with f
aculty and students before making their decision. Admitted students are advised by CISPA faculty. All doctoral researchers at CISPA will be a member o
f a graduate program at our partnering degree-granting universities. For example, PhD Students in Saarbrücken are part of the Saarbrücken Graduate Sch
ool of Computer Science at Saarland University , with whom we have a long-standing close collaboration. CISPA is committed to increasing the represent
ation of women, minorities, and individuals with disability in Computer Science. In accordance with the Equal Opportunity Plan, CISPA aims at increasi
ng the number of women in Computer Science, and explicitly encourages women to apply. Applications of severely disabled candidates with equivalent qua
lifications will be given priority. In general, we welcome applications regardless of gender, nationality, ethnic and social origin, religion/belief, 
disability, age, sexual orientation and identity. In case of interest in working at CISPA, please press the "" button at the end of the page. Please u
pload your documents in PDF format on our application platform. Applications via email cannot be accepted. For any questions regarding the application
 process, please contact us at applications@cispa.de. About CISPA CISPA Helmholtz Center for Information Security is a German national Science Institu
tion within the Helmholtz Association and provides a unique work environment that offers the advantage of a university department and a research labor
atory alike. CISPA's mission is to rethink the digitized world of the future from the ground on up an make it safer through innovative cutting-edge re
search. CISPA is committed to the highest international academic standards. We offer a world-class research environment that grants extensive resource
s to a wide range of researchers and constitutes an attractive destination for the best talents and scientists from all countries. CISPA provides a hi
ghly international and diverse working environment, currently hosting researchers of over 40 nationalities. CISPA headquarter is located in Saarbrücke
n, in the tri-border area of Germany, France and Luxembourg. The CISPA campus is located close to Saarland University, which is known for its excellen
ce in Computer Science, the Max Planck Institute for Informatics, the Max Planck Institute for Software Systems, and the German Research Center for Ar
tificial Intelligence (DFKI). For more information about CISPA, see https://cispa.de/en All information on the processing of your personal data, your 
statements in the application process and your data privacy rights can be found in our data privacy policy. ! &nbsp; Diesen Job melden

ADAS/AD (m/f/d) Systems Engineering Berlin At CARIAD, we're bundling and further expanding the Volkswagen Group's software expertise. We’re uniting ov
er 6,500 global experts to build a scalable technology stack, including a software platform, unified electronic architecture and reliable connection t
o the automotive cloud. Our CARIDIANS are developing vehicle functions such as driver assistance systems, a next-generation infotainment platform, pow
er electronics and charging technology, and digital services in and around the vehicle. Our software can already be found in Volkswagen ID. models and
 will soon power Audi and Porsche vehicles with the E3 1.2 platform in 2024. It's no easy task, but with experts like you, we can shape the future of 
mobility. Join us at CARIAD and be part of this exciting journey! YOUR TEAM The team specializes in developing advanced video perception algorithms, r
elying on optimal preconditions defined by your work to deliver the best possible image in any traffic situation. You are in contact with system archi
tects, customer functions and visual perception engineers, to guarantee the optimal system consisting of perception algorithms, processing hardware an
d the sensor system you define and design. WHAT YOU WILL DO Collect, analyze, and document requirements, aligning them with stakeholders and utilizing
 them as input into software and architecture design, adhering to automotive processes and company standards Develop requirements for the next generat
ion's vision sensors based on the system requirements and state of the art and beyond camera technology Define next generation's vision sensors' optim
al compontents in cooperation with perception system architects Define and establish the optimal vision sensor set by optimally assemble, adust and pa
rameterize the components Take the initiative to improve and maintain working processes and development infrastructure within your team, contributing 
to the team's overall success Keep contact with external providers and state of the art imaging technology WHO YOU ARE Degree in Computer Science, Ele
ctrical Engineering or a related field Understanding of ISP blocks, video pipelines in software and hardware and their parameterization for display ap
plications and machine learning Good knowledge of image quality metrics for sharpness, color accuracy, image similarity, etc. and their calculation ru
les and how they relate to the parameterization of ISP blocks with a good understanding of digital photography/videography, the concepts of the hardwa
re used (optics, image sensors), HDR principles and the image processing algorithms implementing this Excellent understanding of photography: exposure
 settings, white balance, depth of field including how artificial or natural lighting affects image and video quality Practical knowledge of a common 
programming language, preferably Python or C++ with good knowledge of artificial intelligence and machine learning NICE TO KNOW Remote work options Te

bung Flexible Arbeitszeiten &nbsp; Vollständige Stellenbeschreibung WHO WE ARE: Every day we inhale and exhale around 20.000 times, while our air beco
mes more and more polluted. Air pollution kills more than 7 million people per year. Yet, we are missing crucial data to develop strategies how to cur
b emissions. We at Breeze Technologies fight every day to create more sustainable cities for a cleaner tomorrow. Breeze Technologies is a leading star
tup in the field of air quality sensors, air quality data and clean air action analytics. We support cities, businesses and NGOs to monitor hyperlocal
 air quality and design more efficient clean air action plans with Artificial Intelligence and the Internet of Things. Our startup develops its own ha
rdware – our air quality sensors – and software – our Environmental Intelligence Cloud – at our headquarters in Hamburg, Germany. Both enable our cust
omers to generate local air quality insights and create a healthier environment. Breeze was founded in 2015 and has since scaled to a customer base in
 9 countries as well as international partnerships, for instance with Microsoft and the US Homeland Security. Our work has received numerous internati
onal awards, including the “Hamburger Gründerpreis” (Hamburg Founders Award) and a commendation by the German Federal President. Aufgaben YOUR RESPONS

ecture and application landscape and further our development activities Development and improvement of our applications and cloud infrastructure Worki

tion WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR: We are looking for a Software Engineering Lead to start immediately. You will be in charge of leading the software develo
pment at Breeze Technologies and making architectural and technological decisions based on customer and partner needs, while also implementing new fea
tures yourself. You will be supported by a team of working students and freelancers that will grow to include additional developers. You will also wor
k closely with our technology partners, such as Microsoft’s partner success team, to continuously improve our cloud applications. Ideally, you are a f
ull-stack developer with a particular focus on backend development and data processing. Ideally, you have 3+ years of full-time experience as a full-s
tack developer. You are comfortable in business English. The command of the German language is a plus. You will be working with our existing technolog
y stack: Back end: NodeJS, Python (including Machine Learning with Jupyter Notebook) Front end: ReactJS, TypeScript Source control management: Bitbuck
et Databases: MySQL, MongoDB Cloud: Microsoft Azure (Serverless/Azure Functions, other components) Benefits YOUR GOALS: Develop and deploy major new p
roduct features that support our customers in better understanding the air quality in their environments Intensify the relationship to our technology

 Stellenbeschreibung For our customer, EUMETSAT we are looking for two future colleagues with experience in Cloud and Serverless activities and to mai
ntain, support, develop our customer's on-prem and hybrid cloud infrastructure. The scope of the work is built upon EUMETSAT cloud infrastructures and
 services, encompassing various cloud service models on Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) and Platform as a Service (PaaS), by relying on leading-edg
e technologies such as cloud technologies, (e.g. OpenStack, Docker, Kubernetes) and automation tools and by optimizing multi-cloud environments to off
er unified and efficient platforms. In essence, the scope is driven by rapidly evolving cloud technologies to create an agile, secure, and efficient d
igital environment that is beneficial to EUMETSAT users, safeguards data, and advances meteorological and environmental monitoring. The typical tasks 
would include: Provide cloud systems maintenance (take over routine operations, monitoring, troubleshooting, patching, and upgrading, etc). Assessment
 of current cloud services and infrastructure of EUMETSAT. Identifying strengths, weaknesses, and areas for improvement for the cloud services in each
 of the EUMETSAT cloud initiatives as well as identifying the synergies between existing EUMETSAT cloud platforms and solutions Support the integratio
n of new technologies into the existing cloud systems: o Support the integration of new services such as GIT, Container registry and IAM (Identity and
 Access Management) o Support the integration of resource-intensive services, such as Kubernetes, HTC (High-Throughput) batch processing, and serverle
ss functions (such as OpenFaaS) o Develop, enhance, and maintain IaC (Infrastructure as Code) scripts and configurations (e.g., Terraform, Ansible) to
 automate infrastructure provisioning and management o Collaboration with cross-functional teams, including development, operations, and security to e
nsure a successful evolution of EUMETSAT’s cloud systems Design, maintain and improve infrastructure automation strategies. Development of customer us
e cases and examples to demonstrate benefits and possibilities of the cloud offering. Provide end user support (related to cloud issues like guidance 
for best infrastructure utilization, review and improve use cases, troubleshoot problems, and provide ad-hoc training and expertise) Your Profile: Man
datory skills: You should have experience managing, deploying, and scaling application in different cloud technologies: Specifically, should have good
 understanding and experience in serverless architecture patterns, being able to design and implement serverless applications and support 3rd parties 
on their transition. Should have experience with container orchestration (Docker and Kubernetes), being capable of deploy, manage, and troubleshoot co
ntainer environments. Should be familiar with OpenStack platform administration. This includes deploying, managing, and troubleshooting OpenStack infr
astructure and services, and having good understanding of OpenStack components (Neutron, Cinter, Nova, Glance, Keystone, Heat, etc). Should be fluent 
using Infrastructure as Code tool set (like Git, Terraform, Ansible or similar tools). A good understanding of cloud networking concepts (as security 
groups, network access control lists, routing, firewalls, load balancing, subnetting, VPN and virtual private clouds) is necessary. For an effective s
upport, you should have: Proficiency in scripting and automation using tools (Bash, PowerShell, Python or any other CLI for cloud infrastructure manag
ement and configuration). Knowledge of Continuous Integration (CI), Continuous Testing (CT), and Continuous Deployment (CD) best practices, principles
, tools, and frameworks. Desired skills: In-depth knowledge and practical experience in GNU/Linux system administration with multiple distributions. T
he ability and experience to troubleshoot issues in a complex cloud environment involving multiple layers and being able to identify issues on applica
tion, network, and infrastructure layers. Have practical experience on Function as a Service (FaaS) and/or Service Mesh and service to service layer. 
Be familiar with cloud Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning, ideally including practical implementation of algorithms and ML in environments. Ha
ving experience and proficiency developing and deploying Cloud-Native Applications. Be familiar with Elasticsearch, Logstash and Kibana (ELK) stack. B
e familiar with Dask and Apache Airflow. Certifications, such CNCF, Linux foundation, CKA/CKS and similar are as well and advantage. Fluency in Englis
h (spoken and written) is mandatory, as English is the working language. This is a hybrid position where you will be working up to 3 days/week at home
 and the rest at EUMETSAT's location in Darmstadt (a city of 160K population, 30km south of Frankfurt am Main) Germany. The variety of the tasks and t
he scope of the systems to be supported require a high degree of autonomy and good analytical skills together with the ability to effectively cooperat
e within the team. Additional information For further information, please contact Mrs. Raluca Moise by telephone +49 6151 860050 or by email ta.space@

eople on land, at sea and in the air. In space, we are engaged in reaching new frontiers and enabling people on our planet to deal with new and future

ge Stellenbeschreibung elevait The mission of elevait GmbH & Co. KG (elevait) is to empower enterprises to unlock the potential of Artificial Intellig
ence (AI) for their business. Our unique approach is providing AI technology in an easy-to-integrate and easy-to-use software product - and that leads
 to swift business values for our customers. To achieve this, we bring together state-of-the-art machine learning approaches, powerful semantic web co
ncepts, as well as modern web and DevOps technologies in our user-friendly products. Our software teams are working on bringing everything together fo
r our customers, by providing the service orchestration layer and the web application of our elevait suite. Among others, they provide functionalities
 for providing and exploring customer data, configuring and applying automatization rules, or annotating training and benchmark data. To continue our 
endeavor and bring our products to the next level, we are currently looking for an Engineering Manager who is eager to support one of our software tea
ms in Dresden! Your Role You’re responsible for inspiring, leading, and growing our software engineering teams, which are developing the web applicati
ons You are pushing the agile development of the web applications of our elevait suite, striving for powerful, user-friendly, and scalable solutions Y
ou prioritize efforts, take calculated risks, and articulate the short and long-term consequences for different stakeholders You foster and take on th
e end-to-end responsibility of the provided functionalities in the context of a CI/CD development setup You make sure that the delivered software meet
s previously identified requirements and is of high quality by following or improving robust quality assurance processes and practices You synchronize
 regularly with all relevant stakeholders (e.g., other teams, management, customer, users) to collect and clarify requirements and document them for t
he team Your Skills You have experience in leading a team of software engineers in an agile environment You have multiple years of experience in devel
oping either web-based applications (e.g., using TypeScript, Angular, Node.js) or Java-based backend tools You are aware of tools and technologies for
 building, testing, deploying, and monitoring applications in CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, Sentry, …) You love to work in a struct
ured way within a team and independently You have excellent communication skills in both, German and English Our Culture You will be part of a young, 
dynamic, highly motivated, and skilled team You will work with people who love their work and also enjoy coming to the office every day You will have 
the chance to work with and around state-of-the-art technologies to build cutting-edge products You will be part of a modern agile development environ
ment. Everyone has a voice! This also means: a flat hierarchy, a casual and friendly atmosphere, and lots of fun You will have flexible working hours 
and can freely decide to work from the office or remotely You will get the chance to work with a truly diverse and international team Last but not lea
st: You will be able to enjoy the usual cool stuff such as free drinks, coffee, team events, and so on Currently, we cannot support relocation and VIS
A processes from abroad of the EU. &nbsp; Diesen Job melden

ellungsart Vollzeit &nbsp; Arbeitsort 68309 Mannheim &nbsp; Vollständige Stellenbeschreibung Research Scientist (f/m/d) – Applied Security for Industr
ial Systems (80-100%) Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a 
more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilitie
s, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and cele
brates individual differences. Your role and responsibilities ABB is a technology leader in digital transformation of industries toward autonomous ind
ustrial process plants, factories, and smart buildings, enabling sustainability, efficiency, productivity, and higher human well-being. You are intere
sted in applied (IT) security research for connected and secure (industrial) systems, including security architectures and security engineering aspect
s? You are also interested in security of industrial networks and devices, embedded up to edge/cloud platforms, or industrial systems and applications
? Then join the ABB family and apply your knowledge in an innovative and fascinating environment. In your role as a research scientist, you work with 
industrial networks, devices, platforms, software tools, and system architectures. Security technologies such as zero-trust networking, intrusion dete
ction, or continuous security management play an important role to protect industrial systems, while recent advances in machine learning promise addit
ional automation of important security aspects. Innovative and usable security services for our customers are another important research target. • As 
part of diverse, multi-disciplinary teams, you design sustainable, scalable, and adaptable network and system architectures. • You develop application
-driven solutions and apply your (IT) security engineering knowledge, in conformance with industrial standards and regulations. • You team up to find 
innovative ways for interoperable and automated security services including machine learning or artificial intelligence potentials. • With your techni
cal expertise, you initiate, guide, and contribute to applied research projects, and provide consultancy to product development teams. • You collabora
te internationally with ABB divisions, customers, partners, startups, and renowned academic institutes. • You build prototypes and showcase your work 
in demonstrators inside and outside of ABB. • You secure intellectual property by patent applications and publish scientific articles. • You have the 
chance to continuously develop your technical expertise and personal skills. Qualifications for the role We value cross-cultural communication skills 
and creativity, initiative, and result orientation to drive your innovations toward new products and services. Proficient English skills are mandatory
. Above average degree in IT security, computer science, automation engineering or a related field, combined with either academic (PhD) or professiona
l experience of at least 2 years. Experience with security architectures, and network and device security (e.g., intrusion prevention, endpoint detect
ion and response, zero trust principles, trusted computing). Experience with security engineering (e.g., security and privacy by design, threat analys
is, risk assessment), and standards and regulations (e.g., IEC 62443). Hands-on experience in (embedded) software development (e.g., Rust, C++, DevOps
) and prototypical validation of security concepts. As a plus, knowledge in modern software edge/Cloud integration technologies (e.g., OpenShift, Dock
er) or industrial networking technologies (e.g., OPC UA, TSN). Knowledge in one of the following fields is beneficial: domain knowledge in motion/driv
es or process automation. Benefits Retirement plan Flexible work practices Canteen Employee Share Acquisition Plan Wellbeing program More about us Add
itional Benefits Teams with deep technical expertise in various areas Diverse, international working culture Flexible work practices Family-friendly w
ork environment Excellent personal development opportunities We look forward to receiving your application (documents submitted in English are appreci
ated). If you want to discover more about ABB, take another look at our website www.abb.com. ABB is able to offer you an interesting role within a hig
hly motivated team, together with open communication structures. On the basis of a personal, practice-oriented induction programme, you will be given 
the opportunity to acquire the confidence needed to work independently and self-reliantly within your assigned area. Even after the joining phase, ABB
 offers a wide range of individual career development opportunities and supports you in realising your career goals with targeted training measures. A
t ABB you will find an attractive working environment in all phases of life - including mobility services such as bicycle leasing, policies for sabbat
icals and home office, the ABB children's vacation camp and taking care of family members. Interested in joining our team? We are looking forward to r
eceiving your complete application through our online tool. In the case of equal suitability, people with severe disabilities and their equals are giv
en preference. ABB AG Your contact is: ABB PersonalDirekt +49 (0) 621 381 3500 ABB Data Privacy Statement: https://new.abb.com/privacy-notice/candidat

ion TeamViewer is a leading global technology company that provides a cutting-edge platform to remotely access, control and support devices of any kin

strator (all genders) at our HQ and satisfy our colleagues by delivering outstanding IT support. Join our IT Service Desk Team to be a go to person fo
r our TeamViewer colleagues and support in any IT request. Show your problem-solving skills and escalate to responsible teams if necessary. Provision,

ity for procurement of IT software and hardware. Work together with our global IT team to provide best-in-class solutions to all TeamViewer employees.

illingness to learn. Working independently is just as important to you as team spirit. Think out of the Box – challenge our status quo and bring Ideas

us der vollständigen Stellenbeschreibung Firmenevents Kostenbeteiligung am Arbeitsweg &nbsp; Vollständige Stellenbeschreibung Who we are CYTENA is a y
oung and fast-growing high-tech company dedicated to developing automated high-precision lab instruments for the life science research and pharmaceuti
cal industry. Its award-winning devices are used at prestigious academic and pharmaceutical labs around the world to automate workflows in numerous ap
plication areas, including stable cell line development, single-cell omics, high-throughput screening and drug discovery. Since 2019 CYTENA is part of
 the BICO Group. BICO is the leading bio convergence company in the world, equipping hundreds of laboratories and thousands of scientists with cutting
-edge life science technologies. By combining different technologies, such as robotics, artificial intelligence, computer science, and 3D bioprinting 
with biology, BICO enables customers to improve people's health and lives for the better. Our mission is: At CYTENA, we make the development of modern
 therapies faster, safer, and more affordable. We are seeking an experienced and visionary Head of Product (m/f/d) to oversee our entire Product Manag
ement activities. This role is pivotal in driving our product strategy, development, and market success. The Head of Product collaborates with Sales &
 Marketing, Customer Support, and Research & Development (R&D) teams to ensure our products meet the needs of our customers and align with our busines
s objectives and will work closely with the executive management of the company. This position is to be based at our headquarters in Freiburg im Breis
gau, Germany, or in a hybrid mode. Responsibilities Develop and maintain a deep understanding of our target market, competitive landscape, customer pe
rsonas, and user behavior to inform product decisions Develop and execute the product strategy and roadmap, and prioritize product features based on c
ustomer insights, and in alignment with company goals Identify new markets and opportunities aligned with the company strategy Lead and manage the Pro
duct Management team, fostering a collaborative and innovative environment Collaborate with R&D to guide product development, ensuring product-market-
fit, and an ideal time-to-market of high-quality products and workflow solutions Drive product lifecycle management from concept to launch, including 
market research, product design, pricing, and positioning Develop effective go-to-market strategies and ensure efficient execution Ensure effective co
mmunication and alignment across all departments involved in product development and delivery Engage with key customers and stakeholders to gather fee
dback and drive continuous improvement Continuously track market and competitive intelligence, customer feedback, and business performance, ensuring i
nformation is centrally stored Qualifications Master’s degree in Life Sciences or Engineering, or a related field; MBA or advanced degree can be a plu
s Multiple years of experience in product management or commercial roles, with a proven track record of leading product teams Strong background in the
 life sciences tools or biotech industry, with experience in cell culture instrumentation and automation workflow solutions preferred Excellent leader
ship, communication, and interpersonal skills Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment Strong analytical and problem-solving a
bilities Demonstrated ability to drive cross-functional collaboration and alignment Proven track record in implementing effective product management b
est practices and processes, such as methods for structured collection of customer insights, holistic launch planning, and developing business cases W
illingness to travel occasionally (10%) to customers or conferences What we offer Joining CYTENA means being part of something big and shaping the fut
ure of medicine. We are a fast-growing life sciences company with award winning products and a fun, cool team that is friendly and supportive. Agile s
tart-up culture: We are a dynamic and international company and are proud of our flat organizational structure. We work agile in cross-functional team
s. Flexible working: We focus on results not working hours or location. We want our employees to be as productive and happy as possible and therefore 
rely on a hybrid working model with a lot of flexibility. Workplace: An important requirement to work productively! You will have a well-equipped work
place with proper IT-Equipment. Team building: Teamwork is a top priority for us! We are open-minded, help each other and enjoy organizing team events
. Benefits: The CYTENA team always gives its best, and we want to give something back. You can choose between three great benefits: public transport j
ob ticket, Givve Card or Hansefit - your choice! On top: We offer free fruit, water and coffee, a cereal and snack bar, a well-connected office with a
 fantastic rooftop terrace, ball pool, chillout area, underground parking spaces and many more … Green City Freiburg: You will find our new and modern
 Green City Office in the Güterbahnhof-Areal, the new vibrant district of Freiburg. At the gates of the Black Forest in the sunny southwest of Germany
, you will find the green university city Freiburg with its historic city center, its unbeatable charm and a wide range of leisure and cultural activi
ties. Company Pension Plan: The future of our employees is important to us. It is possible to participate in the company pension plan by our insurance
 partner with attractive conditions and an above-legal employer’s subsidy. A chance to make a difference: We are in the life sciences industry and our
 work is an excellent way to contribute to the development of new drugs and treatments that will be used to help hundreds of thousands of people world
wide. Do you want to become part of our success story? Then apply online via our job portal. Please note that for Data Privacy compliance we are not a
ble to accept any e-mail applications! At CYTENA, we don’t just accept difference — we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefi
t of our employees, our products, and our community. We are an equal opportunity workplace and will always pride ourselves on being a collaborative en
vironment. &nbsp; Diesen Job melden

nbefristet | Job-ID: 844160 Was wir zusammen vorhaben: Als Geschäftsbereich Analytics der REWE Group sind wir Teil des Vorstandsressorts Customer, Ana
lytics & Technology, mit dem wir alle strategischen, analytischen und geschäftsunterstützenden Funktionen innerhalb von Handel Deutschland unter einem
 Dach zusammenführen. Der Geschäftsbereich befindet sich in einer spannenden Transformation und verfolgt das Ziel, Advanced Analytics sowie Artificial
 Intelligence als ergänzenden Werttreiber in allen wesentlichen Geschäftsentscheidungen zu etablieren. Agile Arbeitsweisen mit cross funktional agiere
nden Teams bieten die perfekte Arbeitsumgebung, um die Entwicklung analytischer Produkte und Use Cases voranzutreiben. Sei dabei, wenn AA & AI im deut
schen Lebensmitteleinzelhandel auf ein neues Niveau gehoben werden! Was du bei uns bewegst: Du willst die 6.500 REWE- und Penny-Märkte bei ihren Entsc
heidungsprozessen analytisch unterstützen, die zukünftige Strategie von Handel Deutschland auf ein datengetriebenes Fundament stellen oder eine KI-bas
ierte Liquiditätsprognose entwickeln? Dabei arbeitest du gern in der Schnittstelle und in direktem Kontakt mit den Stakeholdern? Gleichzeitig magst du
 es, an komplexen Problemstellungen zu tüfteln und tief in Datenstrukturen einzusteigen? Dann mach bei uns doch direkt beides – in deiner Rolle als An
alytics Consultant fungierst du in unserem Team als Translator zwischen Analytics Organisation und den Fachbereichen mit dem Fokus, datengetriebene Lö
sungen für Fragestellungen aus dem Business zu erarbeiten. Einen Wertbeitrag liefern: Als Analytics Consultant treibst du spannende und herausfordernd
e Advanced Analytics-Projekte im Lebensmittelhandel zur nachhaltigen Optimierung von Entscheidungsprozessen voran, die einen direkten Einfluss auf das
 Business unserer Märkte, die zukünftige Strategie oder finanzwirtschaftliche Projekte von Handel Deutschland haben. Außerdem trägst du durch die Etab
lierung von analytischen Produkten zum Heben von Geschäftspotenzialen bei. Effiziente Abläufe schaffen: Du erfasst, strukturierst, analysierst und vis
ualisierst bestehende Geschäftsprozesse, um diese zu optimieren und weiterzuentwickeln. Analytik ins Business bringen: Du bist eng mit den Fachbereich
en verzahnt, identifizierst analytische Bedarfe und erarbeitest proaktiv Handlungsempfehlungen auf Basis von Datenauswertungen, die du auf unterschied
lichen Management-Ebenen präsentierst und kommunizierst. Innovation vorantreiben: Du hinterfragst den Status Quo, entwickelst Reportings weiter und pr
üfst kontinuierlich sowohl den Bedarf wie die Möglichkeit zur Automatisierung derselben. Hierbei suchst du stets nach Potenzialen, verbesserte oder ga
nz neue Analyseverfahren zu implementieren. Was uns überzeugt: Zuallererst Deine Persönlichkeit: Dein sehr gutes analytisches und konzeptionelles Denk
vermögen gepaart mit ausgeprägten kommunikativen Fähigkeiten - insbesondere gegenüber fachfremden Kolleg:innen und Zuhörer:innen sowie deine Leidensch
aft für das Thema Datenanalyse. Deine Fähigkeit, neue herausfordernde Geschäftsfragen schnell zu verstehen sowie mit passgenauen analytischen Verfahre
n flexibel zu beantworten. Du zeichnest dich durch eine ausgeprägte Dienstleistungs- wie Teamorientierung aus und bringst Begeisterung für die Arbeit 
in einem agilen und dynamischen Umfeld mit. Gleichzeitig bist du stets auf dem aktuellen Stand, was Technologien und Entwicklungen betrifft. Ein abges
chlossenes Masterstudium mit Analytics-Bezug (z.B. Wirtschaftsinformatik, Statistik, Ökonometrie, Informatik, Mathematik, Physik o.ä.). Gerne auch mit
 betriebswirtschaftlichem (z.B. finanzwirtschaftlichen) Bezug und/oder Promotion. Außerdem deine in der Praxis erprobte Erfahrung in der Datenanalyse 
und in analytischen Projekten - gerne auch in Cloud-Umgebungen. Deine sehr guten Programmierkenntnisse mit fundierter Praxiserfahrung in SQL (z.B. Sno
wflake) oder Python, sowie erste Erfahrungen von Digital Analytics Solutions, wie etwa Adobe Analytics oder Google Analytics sind von Vorteil. Deine f
undierten Kenntnisse in der adressatengerechten Aufbereitung und Visualisierung der Insights mit Hilfe von z.B. Power BI, Tableau oder auch Power Poin
t. Was wir bieten: Die REWE Group als einer der größten Handels- und Touristikkonzerne Europas bietet einzigartige Voraussetzungen für alle, die etwas
 bewegen wollen. Entdecke einen lebensnahen Arbeitgeber, der Dir Vertrauen schenkt, Gestaltungsfreiräume ermöglicht und durch flexible Strukturen Inno
vationen und frische Ideen fördert. Wer bei uns arbeitet und viel bewegt, darf auch viel erwarten: Attraktive Vergütung: Mit Sonderleistungen wie Urla

Stellenbeschreibung Gleichen Sie hier die Stellenbeschreibung mit Ihrem 
Profil ab. Anstellungsart Vollzeit &nbsp; Arbeitsort 12489 Berlin &nbsp; Leistungen Aus der vollständigen Stellenbeschreibung Betriebliche Altersvorso
rge Flexible Arbeitszeiten Verkehrsanbindung &nbsp; Vollständige Stellenbeschreibung Über den Job Wir sind ein Hightech-Startup aus Berlin-Adlershof, 
das sich zum Ziel gesetzt hat, die weltweit führende Technologieplattform für objektive, nicht-invasive Hautdiagnostik zu werden. Unsere Hauptanwendun
g ist die Hautkrebsfrüherkennung, ein wesentlicher Beitrag für Patienten auf der ganzen Welt, um die Zahl der Menschen zu reduzieren, die an fehldiagn
ostiziertem Hautkrebs leiden. Bei Magnosco bringen wir unsere umfassende Erfahrung in der Medizintechnik, der Hautkrebsdiagnostik und der künstlichen 
Intelligenz zusammen (https://magnosco.com/publikationen/). Wir haben unser erstes medizinisches Produkt erfolgreich entwickelt und zertifiziert, und 
derzeit entwickeln wir ein neues Gerät, das die weltweit neuesten Fortschritte in der Optik und der KI vereint. Um dies zu erreichen, sind wir auf der
 Suche nach hoch motivierten und qualifizierten Mitarbeitern für unser Produktentwicklungsteam. Komm zu uns und werde Teil des "next big thing" in der
 Medizintechnik! Über die Rolle Du entwickelst gerne, möchtest Deine Fähigkeiten unter Beweis stellen und mit Deiner Arbeit einen direkten Beitrag zum
 Kampf gegen Hautkrebs leisten? Hast Du Spaß an Herausforderungen und kreativer Ingenieursarbeit? Wenn das nach Dir klingt, wollen wir Dich im Magnosc
o-Team haben! Als Teil unseres Teams bist Du für die Prüfung unserer Medizinprodukte verantwortlich und arbeitest sowohl selbstständig als auch mit in
ternen und externen Partnern und Prüflaboren zusammen. Bitte beachte, dass Untersuchungen zeigen, dass sich Männer auf Stellen bewerben, wenn sie durc
hschnittlich 60 % der Kriterien erfüllen, während Frauen und benachteiligte Personen dazu neigen, sich nur zu bewerben, wenn sie alle Kriterien erfüll
en. Wenn Du glaubst, dass Du das Zeug dazu hast, auch wenn Du nicht jeden einzelnen Punkt der Stellenbeschreibung erfüllst, nehme bitte trotzdem Konta
kt mit uns auf. Wir würden uns gerne mit Dir unterhalten und herausfinden, ob Du zu uns passen könntest. About the Job We're a high-tech startup from 
Berlin-Adlershof, on a mission to become the world's leading technology platform for objective, non-invasive skin diagnostics. Our primary application
 is early skin cancer detection, an essential service for patients worldwide, reducing the number of people suffering from misdiagnosed skin cancer. A
t Magnosco, we bring together our extensive experience in medical technology, skin cancer diagnostics, and artificial intelligence (https://magnosco.c
om/publikationen/). We've successfully developed and certified our first medical product, and currently, we're developing a new device that unifies th
e world's latest advancements in optics and AI. To achieve this, we're on the lookout for highly motivated and qualified individuals for our product d
evelopment team. Join us and be part of the "next big thing" in medical technology! About the Role Are you into developing, looking to put your skills
 to the test, and see your work contribute directly to the fight against skin cancer? Do you enjoy challenges and creative engineering work? If this s
ounds like you, we want you on the Magnosco team! As part of our team, you will be responsible for testing our medical products and will work both ind
ependently and with internal and external partners and test laboratories. Please note research shows that while men apply to jobs when they meet an av
erage of 60% of the criteria, women and marginalized folks tend to only apply when they check every box. If you think you have what it takes, even if 
you don't meet every single point on the job description, please still get in touch. We'd love to have a chat and see if you could be a great fit. Zu 
Deinen Aufgaben gehören u.a.: Verantwortlich für Geräteverifikation in Zusammenarbeit mit den Fachgebieten (u.a. Optik, Elektronik, Mechanik, Embedded
), Definition und Planung von Verifikationsstrategien entlang der Produktentwicklung, Organisation und Kommunikation mit externen Prüflaboren, Entwick
eln von Test- und Prüfstandskonzepten, Support in der Entwicklung von Produktions- und End of Line-Tests, Programmierung von Testautomatisierung und A
uswertesoftware, Verantwortung für Prüf- und Messmitteln, Support im Requirementsmanagement hinsichtlich der Testbarkeit von Anforderungen, Pflege des
 Verifikationspfades im Requirements Management Tool, Support der Fachbereiche bei Engineering Tests. Responsible for device verification in collabora
tion with the specialised departments (e.g. optics, electronics, mechanics, embedded), Definition and planning of verification strategies along the pr
oduct development process, Organisation and communication with external test laboratories, Developing test and test bench concepts, Support in the dev
elopment of production and end-of-line tests, Programming test automation and evaluation software, Responsibility for testing and measuring equipment,

t tool, Supporting the specialist departments with engineering tests. So begeisterst Du uns: Must have Min. Bachelor-Abschluss in Physik oder Ingenieu
rwesen, Sicherer Umgang mit dem Lesen und Schreiben von Anforderungen, Sicherer Umgang mit der Erstellung einer Testspezifikation, Umfassende praktisc

Job ID: R0332465 Full/Part-Time: Full-time Regular/Temporary: Regular Listed: 2024-06-17 Location: Berlin Position Overview About the job Commercial B
anking Tribe You’ll be joining the Commercial Bank Tribe, who is focusing on the special needs of the small and medium enterprise clients in Germany, 
a designated area for further growth and investment within Corporate Bank. We are responsible for the digital transformation of ~800.000 clients in 3 
brands, i.e. the establishment of the BizBanking platform including development of digital sales and service processes as well as the automation of pr
ocesses for this client segment. Our tribe is on a journey of an extensive digitalisation of business processes and to migrate our applications to the
 cloud. On that we are working jointly together with our business colleagues in an agile setup and collaborating closely with stakeholders and enginee
rs from other areas thriving to achieve a highly automated and adoptable process and application landscape. As Solution Architect (m/f/x) you work in 
our Sales Squads designing and implementing user friendly and efficient digital processes for our corporate clients. Together with the enterprise arch
itects you shape the software architecture and define E2E solution designs for new processes. You love this job but feel you cannot tick 100% of the b

tions are in line with our IT strategy. You support the Squads in developing new features and digital processes as well as in migrating existing proce
sses and features to a new cloud-based solution architecture. You will work with the teams to validate the feasibility of the designed solutions, and 
support with architectural guidance during implementation. You will work closely with enterprise and domain architects and communicate with business a
nd technology stakeholders to identify and broaden the solution space and identify the right technologies for the product delivery. You consult produc
t owners, engineers, application owners and all other stakeholders with regards to technical questions and challenges. You will work in an agile setup

ture complex tasks. You enjoy working in an open, highly collaborative teams based in multiple locations and being a good team player with a passion f

g with account management teams Experience designing, building, or operating large scale IT security systems - either on premises or in the cloud in a

 their needs and wants to inform the roadmap of AWS security services and features. In this role, your creativity will build effective design patterns

rticipate in the creation and sharing of best practices, technical content and new reference architectures (e.g. white papers, code samples, blog post

you can educate AWS customers about the art of the possible, while challenging the impossible, come build the future with us. You will also have to ma
nage the relationship with selected top Security partners of AWS, including ISV and GSI. You will be asked to lead some of the key team initiatives, i
ncluding connecting to other geos security team to create synergies and share best practises. This role is within the EMEA organization and you would

idance on their customer engagements by developing white papers, blogs, reference implementations, and presentations to enable customers and 3rd parti

ntegrate AWS solutions into customer architectures. Candidates have a mix of communication and technical skills, and will have the ability to engage w
ith customers at different levels in the organization, from executive to developer. Previous experience with AWS is desired but not required, provided

S service teams, influencing their roadmaps and driving innovation. If you are someone who enjoys innovating, likes solving hard problems and working

r. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support als
o partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services. Key job responsibilities Customers'

; Vollständige Stellenbeschreibung We are one of the largest and oldest universities in Europe and one of the most important employers in our region. 
Our broad range of subjects, the dynamic development of our main research areas and our central location in Cologne make us attractive for students an
d researchers from around the world. We offer a wide range of career opportunities in science, technology, and administration. The Chair of Special Ed
ucation in Mathematics focuses on topics related to mathematics learning, in particular the diagnosis and support of students‘ mathematical learning p
rocesses. Technologies are used in various ways in the development and research activities in the chair - for exam- ple through the development of var
ious apps to promote mathematical learning or through the use of eye tracking, the eye movements recording and artificial intelligence (AI). The adver
tised position focuses on the diagnosis and support of students‘ mathematical learning processes using technology (see „Your tasks“). YOUR TASKS » Sci
entific work on the topic of mathematical learning processes of students in inclusive schools, special schools, or preschool education » Use of techno
logies such as eye tracking, motion track- ing, artificial intelligence (AI), human-robot interaction » Conducting empirical studies with school stude
nts on mathematics learning, using technology » Publication of scientific results in international journals and presentation at conferences » Particip
ation in the implementation, administration and acquisition of third-party funded projects » Participation in the centre for learning difficulties and
 for inclusive learning in mathematics » Participation in teaching (4SWS) - co-conception and implementation of seminars, examinations, co-supervision
 of student theses » Participation in the organizational work of the chair YOUR PROFILE » A completed university degree in teaching with the subject/l
earning area of mathematics or a comparable degree is required » A very good doctorate in mathematics education or a comparable discipline is required
 » Very good written and spoken German and English skills (at least C1 level in each in both languages) » An independent, structured, reliable and com
mitted way of working is required » Very good knowledge of qualitative and quantitative research methods as well as an interest in familiarizing yours
elf with new methods » Previous experience with technological topics, especially with the use of technologies to investigate mathematical teaching and
 learning processes (eye tracking, motion tracking, robotics, AR/VR) is desirable » Openness to new topics and the use of technologies as well as the 
motivation to familiarize yourself with them are required » Experience with scientific publications, especially Eng- lish-language publications in pee
r-reviewed journals is required » Experience in working in third-party funded projects is desirable » A completed second state examination or other ex
pe- rience as a teacher in schools is desirable WE OFFER » A diverse, inspiring and qualifying job in an innovative, dynamic and international field o
f activity » A diverse working environment with equal opportunities » Support in balancing work and family life » Extensive advanced training opportun
ities » Occupational health management offers » Flexible working time models, full-time positions suitable for job sharing » Opportunity to work remot
ely The University of Cologne promotes equal opportunities and diversity. Women will be considered preferentially in accor- dance with the Equal Oppor
tunities Act of North Rhine- Westphalia (Landesgleichstellungsgesetz – LGG NRW). We also expressly welcome applications from all suitable candidates r
egardless of their gender, nationality, ethnic and social origin, religion, disability, age, sexual orientation and identity. The position is availabl
e from 1 October 2024 on a full- time basis (39,83 hours per week). It is limited for a fixed term until 30 September 2026 with the option to extend f
or 1 year. If the applicant meets the relevant wage requirements and personal qualifications, the salary will be based on remuneration group 13 TV-L o
f the pay scale for the German public sector. Please apply online with proof of the required qualifications without a photo under: https://jobportal.u
ni-koeln.de. The reference number is Wiss2407-15. The application deadline is 11.08.2024. For further inquiries, please contact Professor Dr Maike Sch
indler (maike.schindler@uni-koeln.de). Postdoc position (f/m/x) Faculty of Human Sciences Special Education in Mathematics &nbsp; Diesen Job melden

gy - Commercial Banking Job ID: R0332469 Full/Part-Time: Full-time Regular/Temporary: Regular Listed: 2024-06-17 Location: Frankfurt Position Overview
 Über diese Position: Commercial Banking Tribe Sie werden Teil des Commercial Bank Tribes, der sich auf die speziellen Bedürfnisse der kleinen und mit
telständischen Kunden in Deutschland konzentriert, einem ausgewiesenen Bereich für weiteres Wachstum und Investitionen innerhalb der Corporate Bank. W
ir sind verantwortlich für die digitale Transformation von ~800.000 Kunden in 3 Marken, d.h. die Etablierung der BizBanking Plattform inklusive der En
twicklung digitaler Vertriebs- und Serviceprozesse sowie der Automatisierung von Prozessen für dieses Kundensegment. Unser Tribe ist auf dem Weg zu ei
ner umfassenden Digitalisierung der Geschäftsprozesse und zur Migration unserer Anwendungen in die Cloud. Dabei arbeiten wir gemeinsam mit unseren Bus
iness-Kollegen in einem agilen Setup und in enger Zusammenarbeit mit Stakeholdern und Entwicklern aus anderen Bereichen an einer hochautomatisierten u
nd adaptierbaren Prozess- und Anwendungslandschaft. Als Solution Architekt (d/m/w) in einem unserer Sales Squads gestalten und entwickeln Sie nutzerfr
eundliche und effiziente digitale Prozesse für unsere Geschäfts- und Firmenkunden. Gemeinsam mit den Enterprise Architekten gestalten Sie die grundleg
ende Softwarearchitektur und definieren das E2E Lösungsdesign für neue Prozesse. Sie interessieren sich für diesen Job, haben aber das Gefühl, dass Si
e nicht 100 % der Kriterien erfüllen können? Schicken Sie uns trotzdem Ihren Lebenslauf! Ihre Hauptaufgaben Sie sind verantwortlich für die Architektu
r und das Anwendungsdesign für Features, die in Ihrem Squad entwickelt werden, wobei Sie Anforderungen, Aufwand und Kosten für die Lösung ausbalancier
en Dabei stellen Sie sicher, dass unsere Architekturprinzipien eingehalten werden und dass die Lösungen im Einklang mit der IT-Strategie sind. Sie unt
erstützen die Squads bei der Entwicklung neuer Features und digitaler Prozesse sowie bei der Migration von bestehenden Prozessen und Features auf eine
 neue Cloud-basierte Architektur. Sie arbeiten mit den Teams zusammen, um die Machbarkeit der Anwendungsdesigns zu bewerten und beraten Sie aus Archit
ektursicht während der Umsetzung. Sie arbeiten eng mit den Enterprise und Domain Architekten zusammen und kommunizieren mit fachlichen und technischen
 Ansprechpartnern um den Lösungsraum zu identifizieren und zu erweitern sowie um die richtigen Technologien für die Weiterentwicklung des Produkts zu 
identifizieren. Sie beraten Product Owner, Entwickler, Anwendungsverantwortliche und alle anderen Stakeholder in Bezug auf technische Fragestellungen 
und Herausforderungen. Sie arbeiten in einem agilen Umfeld und tragen mit Ihrem Feedback dazu bei, unsere Arbeitsweise zu verbessern. Ihre Kompetenzen
 und Erfahrungen Universitätsabschluss mit technischem oder naturwissenschaftlichem Fokus oder äquivalente Berufserfahrung – idealerweise in der Finan
zdienstleistungs-/ Bankenbranche. Zumindest 2 Jahre praktische Erfahrung als Software Architekt oder leitender Entwickler mit Erfahrung im Lösungsdesi
gn, bevorzugt in einem agilen Setup in den Sie einen oder mehrere Squads unterstützt haben. Gute Kenntnisse der neuesten Technologien, sei es Cloud (G
CP, AWS, Azure), Künstliche Intelligenz, Programmiersprachen (Java, JavaScript, Python), Datenbanken (Postgres, BigQuery) und andere Lösungen. Umfasse
ndes Verständnis zu verschiedenen Architektur- und Lösungsmustern und deren Anwendung sowie sehr gute analytische Fähigkeiten sowie die Fähigkeit komp
lexe Problemstellungen zu strukturieren. Sie arbeiten gerne in einem offenen, hochgradig kollaborativen Team an mehreren Standorten, sind ein guter Te
amplayer mit einer Leidenschaft für Technologie und Entwicklungsarbeit und können fließend in Englisch kommunizieren. Deutschkenntnisse sind ein Plus.

 persönlichen Bedürfnisse abdecken. Emotional ausgeglichen Eine positive Haltung hilft uns, die Herausforderungen des Alltags zu meistern – beruflich 
wie privat. Profitieren Sie von Angeboten wie Beratung in schwierigen Lebenssituationen und Angeboten zur Förderung mentaler Gesundheit. Körperlich fi
t Mit Angeboten zur Aufrechterhaltung Ihrer persönlichen Gesundheit und einem förderlichen beruflichen Umfeld hilft Ihnen die Bank, körperlich fit zu 
bleiben. Profitieren Sie von Angeboten wie umfangreichen Check-up Untersuchungen, Impfangeboten und Beratung zur gesunden Lebensführung. Sozial vernet
zt Der Austausch mit anderen eröffnet uns neue Perspektiven, bringt uns beruflich wie persönlich voran und stärkt unser Selbstvertrauen und Wohlbefind
en. Profitieren Sie von Angeboten wie Unterstützung durch den pme Familienservice, das FitnessCenter Job, flexible Arbeitszeitmodelle (bspw. Teilzeit,
 Jobtandem, hybrides Arbeiten) sowie einer umfangreichen Kultur der Vielfalt, Chancengleichheit und Teilhabe. Finanziell abgesichert Die Bank sichert

________________________________________________________________________ About the job: Commercial Banking Tribe You’ll be joining the Commercial Bank
 Tribe, who is focusing on the special needs of the small and medium enterprise clients in Germany, a designated area for further growth and investmen
t within Corporate Bank. We are responsible for the digital transformation of ~800.000 clients in 3 brands, i.e. the establishment of the BizBanking p
latform including development of digital sales and service processes as well as the automation of processes for this client segment. Our tribe is on a
 journey of an extensive digitalisation of business processes and to migrate our applications to the cloud. On that we are working jointly together wi
th our business colleagues in an agile setup and collaborating closely with stakeholders and engineers from other areas thriving to achieve a highly a
utomated and adoptable process and application landscape. As Solution Architect (f/m/x) you work in our Sales Squads designing and implementing user f
riendly and efficient digital processes for our corporate clients. Together with the enterprise architects you shape the software architecture and def
ine E2E solution designs for new processes. > You love this job but feel you cannot tick 100% of the boxes? Send us your CV anyway! Your key responsib
ilities You are responsible for the architecture and the solution design for features developed in your Squad balancing requirements, effort, and cost
s for the solution. Thereby you ensure that our Architecture principles are followed and that the solutions are in line with our IT strategy. You supp
ort the Squads in developing new features and digital processes as well as in migrating existing processes and features to a new cloud-based solution 
architecture. You will work with the teams to validate the feasibility of the designed solutions, and support with architectural guidance during imple
mentation. You will work closely with enterprise and domain architects and communicate with business and technology stakeholders to identify and broad
en the solution space and identify the right technologies for the product delivery. You consult product owners, engineers, application owners and all 
other stakeholders with regards to technical questions and challenges. You will work in an agile setup, helping with feedback to improve our way of wo
rking. Your skills and experiences University degree with technological or scientific focus or equivalent working experience -ideally in Financial Ser
vices / Banking industry. At least 2 years of experience working as a software architect or a lead engineer with solution design experience preferably
 in a scaled agile setup supporting one or several Squads. Good knowledge of most recent technologies, be it cloud (GCP, AWS, Azure), artificial intel
ligence, programming languages (Java, JavaScript, Python), databases (Postgres, BigQuery), and other solutions. Great understanding on various archite
cture and solution patterns and where to apply them plus very good analytical skills and the ability to structure complex tasks. You enjoy working in 
an open, highly collaborative teams based in multiple locations and being a good team player with a passion for technology and engineering. You are ab
le to communicate fluently in English. German is a Plus. What we will offer you: This job is available in full and parttime. We provide you with a com
prehensive portfolio of benefits and offerings to support both, your private and professional needs. Emotionally and mentally balanced A positive mind
 helps us master the challenges of everyday life – both professionally and privately. We offer consultation in difficult life situations as well as me
ntal health awareness trainings. Physically thriving We support you in staying physically fit through an offering to maintain personal health and a pr
ofessional environment. You can benefit from health check-ups; vaccination drives as well as advice on healthy living and nutrition. Socially connecte
d Networking opens up new perspectives, helps us thrive professionally and personally as well as strengthens our self-confidence and well-being. You c
an benefit from PME family service, FitnessCenter Job, flexible working (e.g parttime, hybrid working, job tandem) as well as an extensive culture of 
diversity, equity and inclusion. Financially secure We provide you with financial security not only during your active career but also for the future.

oss locations, please contact your recruiter with specific questions. In case of any recruitment related questions, please get in touch with Amela Mum

xt chapter of your ABB story. This position reports to Service Operations Manager Your role and responsibilities In this role, you will have the oppor
tunity to ensure that the service portfolio is delivered effectively according to ABB standard processes and safety guidelines to the satisfaction of

siness opportunities utilized for service growth. The work model for the role is: hybrid. #LI-Hybrid You will be mainly accountable for: • Providing t

lented team, where you will be able to thrive. Qualifications for the role You are highly skilled in Windows operating systems, IT security, networkin

ompany or relevant IT or OT area. Experience in the automation environment is an advantage. You are highly adept in common security norms and standard
s. You are at ease communicating in German and English. You are passionate about providing flexible solutions to customer inquiries and problems. What

practices Retirement plan Paid Parental leave (gender neutral) Employee Share Acquisition Plan More about us The Energy Industries Division serves a w
ide range of industrial sectors, including hydrocarbons, chemicals, pharmaceuticals, power generation and water. With its integrated solutions that au
tomate, digitalize and electrify operations, the Division is committed to supporting traditional industries in their efforts to decarbonize. The Divis
ion also supports the development, integration and scaling up of new and renewable energy models. The Division’s goal is to help customers adapt and s
ucceed in the rapidly changing global energy transition. Harnessing data, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI), the Division brings over 
50 years of domain expertise delivering solutions designed to improve energy, process and production efficiency, as well as reduce risk, operational c
ost and capital cost, while minimizing waste for customers, from project start-up and throughout the entire plant lifecycle. We value people from diff
erent backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across

ligence Lösungen - als globaler Konzern bietet Fujitsu das gesamte Spektrum an IT-Services und Produkten aus einer Hand an. Gestalten sie ihre und uns

m Lösungen für die Fujitsu Gesellschaften weltweit bereit zu stellen. Selbständige und permanente Beratung unserer internen Kunden in allen Fragen der

icklung von geeigneten Maßnahmen und Lösungsalternativen zur termingerechten Bereitstellung kundenspezifischer Problemlösungen inklusive der Erstellun

tsort Deutschland &nbsp; Leistungen Aus der vollständigen Stellenbeschreibung Firmenevents Flexible Arbeitszeiten Weiterbildungsprogramme &nbsp; Volls
tändige Stellenbeschreibung FUJITSU – Work Your Way Fujitsu ist ein weltweit führendes IT-Unternehmen mit ca. 130.000 Mitarbeitern in 100 Ländern. Ob 
Hardware oder Cloud Solutions, Consulting oder Artificial Intelligence Lösungen - als globaler Konzern bietet Fujitsu das gesamte Spektrum an IT-Servi
ces und -Produkten aus einer Hand. Gestalte Deine und unsere Welt, indem wir gemeinsam für unsere Kunden hervorragende Ergebnisse erzielen und die dig
itale Transformation vorantreiben. Wir suchen zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt für einen unserer Standorte deutschlandweit einen: (Senior) Solution Archi
tect ITSM & Cross Functions (w/m/d) Legal Entity: Fujitsu Services GmbH Arbeitszeit: 40 Std./ Woche Das IT Servicemanagement Framework der FUJITSU gew
ährleistet die kontinuierliche Überwachung, Steuerung und Optimierung der für unsere Kunden erbrachten IT und Business Services. Der Fokus liegt hierb
ei stets auf dem richtigen Mix aus Prozessen, Tools und Funktionen und deren effektiver Verzahnung zum Zweck der Automatisierung, Reporting und aussag
ekräftiger Analysen. An der Schnittstelle zwischen Delivery, Presales und unseren Kunden entwickelst Du passgenaue Lösungen für das IT Servicemanageme
nt basierend auf standardisierten als auch individuellen Service-Elementen. Hierbei betrachtest Du alle für diesen Zweck erforderlichen Methoden und R
essourcen sowie deren Kosten. Du bist in der Lage, komplexe Sachverhalte verständlich aufzubereiten und zu transportieren und verfügst über ein hohes 
Maß an Kundenorientierung. Du zeichnest Dich aus durch eine hohe Auffassungsgabe, verbindliche Kommunikation, hohe Überzeugungskraft und sehr gute Prä
sentations-Skills. Du bist zudem bereit, gelegentlich zu reisen und hast keine Berührungsängste mit neuen Technologien und agilen Arbeitsmethoden. Fli
eßende Deutsch- und Englisch-Kenntnisse runden Dein Profil ab. Diese spannenden Aufgaben erwarten Dich: Zusammenstellung von Kunden-individuellen, Por
tfolio-übergreifenden Lösungskonzepten und Kostenkalkulationen für Service Delivery-Modelle basierend auf vorhandenen und neu zu erstellenden ITSM Ser
vice-Elementen Unterstützung bei der Ausarbeitung von Angeboten für unsere nationalen und internationalen Bestands- und Neukunden Enge Zusammenarbeit 
mit internen Stakeholdern wie Presales, Delivery, Entwicklung und Architekten angrenzender Service Tower zur Sicherstellung der End-to-End Lieferfähig
keit der angebotenen Leistungen Weiterentwicklung des bestehenden Fujitsu ITSM Portfolios anhand aktueller und zukünftiger Kunden- und Marktanforderun
gen Proaktive und rege Beteiligung am internen Knowledge Management und Expert Exchange Mitwirkung bei Kunden-Präsentationen und gelegentliche Dienstr
eisen Folgende Qualifikationen und Berufserfahrung solltest Du mitbringen: Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium der (Wirtschafts-) Informatik oder eine
 vergleichbare Qualifikation Betriebswirtschaftliche Grundkenntnisse Umfangreiche Kenntnisse von ITSM Prozessen (ITILv3/4), Methoden und Tools Praktis
che Erfahrung mit mind. einem gängigen Service Management Tool Grundlegendes Verständnis von IT Service Design, Transition & Operations Fundiertes Wis
sen zu IT Service Delivery-Modellen sowie deren Rollen und Funktionen Ausgeprägte Team- und Kommunikationsfähigkeit und ein hohes Maß an Kundenorienti
erung Idealerweise konnten Sie bereits einige Jahre Erfahrung im (Pre)Sales, Consulting oder einer vergleichbaren Position sammeln Grundlegende Kenntn
isse zu agilen Methoden (z.B. SCRUM) und modernen (Private/Public/Hybrid) Cloud IT Infrastrukturen sind wünschenswert Sprachkenntnisse gem. des „Gemei
nsamen Europäischen Referenzrahmen für Sprachen“: Deutsch (mind. Level C1), verhandlungssichere Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift (mind. Level B2

 Profil ab. Schichten und Arbeitszeiten Montag bis Freitag &nbsp; Leistungen Aus der vollständigen Stellenbeschreibung Flexible Arbeitszeiten &nbsp; V
ollständige Stellenbeschreibung Unternehmensbeschreibung Continental develops pioneering technologies and services for sustainable and connected mobil
ity of people and their goods. Founded in 1871, the technology company offers safe, efficient, intelligent and affordable solutions for vehicles, mach
ines, traffic and transportation. In 2023, Continental generated sales of €41.4 billion and currently employs around 200,000 people in 56 countries an
d markets. The Automotive group sector comprises technologies for passive safety, brake, chassis, motion and motion control systems. Innovative soluti
ons for assisted and automated driving, display and operating technologies, as well as audio and camera solutions for the vehicle interior, are also p
art of the portfolio, as is intelligent information and communication technology for the mobility services of fleet operators and commercial vehicle m
anufacturers. Comprehensive activities relating to connectivity technologies, vehicle electronics and high-performance computers round off the range o
f products and services. Stellenbeschreibung For the area of product management at the Villingen-Schwenningen site, we are offering an opportunity for
 a bachelor's student (m/f/diverse) to write their mandatory thesis with Continental starting in September 2024. The working-hours will be mainly on-s
ite in Villingen-Schwenningen. Remote work is possible according to prior agreement. The Bachelor Thesis will explore the topic of integrating Artific
ial Intelligence (AI) into fleet management software (VDO Fleet). This project aims to enhance operational efficiency, reduce costs, and improve decis
ion-making processes within fleet operations. The student (m/f/diverse) will support in researching, developing, and proposing innovative AI solutions
 that can be integrated into our existing fleet management systems. Get on board, become a part of Continental and also benefit from our Villingen Int
ernship Program (VIP). Key tasks: Conduct research on current AI technologies and their application in fleet management Analyze existing fleet managem
ent processes to identify areas for improvement through AI integration Develop a detailed proposal outlining the scope, objectives, methodology, and e
xpected outcomes of the thesis. This should include a plan for how AI can be integrated into specific aspects of fleet management software, e.g. in ve
hicle tracking, maintenance scheduling, and fuel consumption optimization. Work closely with the product management and development teams to understan
d the technical architecture of our fleet management software. Propose and prototype AI-driven features or modules that align with the project's goals
 Design and conduct tests to evaluate the effectiveness and efficiency of the proposed AI integrations. This includes setting up benchmarks, analyzing
 data, and gathering feedback from stakeholders Document all research findings, development processes, test results, and analysis in a comprehensive t
hesis. Prepare and deliver a presentation to company stakeholders, showcasing the project, its findings, and potential impact on the business. Qualifi
kationen Bachelor Students (m/f/diverse) in the field of Information Technology, Business Informatics, Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning or s
imilar courses of study Know-how in the field of Artificial intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning Knowledge of Cloud Applications, Jira / Confluence,
 Python, Java, R or similar experience Advanced handling of MS Office-applications Fluent English skills (C1), written and spoken, for daily communica
tion within the international team Good German skills (B1) are a plus Distinct communication skills Analytic thinking, result-oriented work style, cus
tomer orientation, self-dependence Creativity & flexibility Please remember to upload your current enrollment certificate and overview of grades as we
ll as the conditions of study related to mandatory internship, as these are absolutely necessary for the processing of your application! If required, 
please submit your valid residence permit as well as your work permit including the additional sheet. Applications from severely handicapped people ar
e welcome. Zusätzliche Informationen What we offer: An exciting and varied area of responsibility in a motivated team with flat hierarchies Hybrid wor
